events.message: I recently received my order but the size is completely wrong. I want to return it and get a full refund as soon as possible.
The customer reported a problem with the product size and requested a refund. Categorizing as Refund case.
Assigning this refund request case to agent Lisa M. for further handling and response.
Hello! This is Lisa from customer support. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request regarding the incorrect size.
Could you please provide your order number and photos of the product received so I can process the refund?
Thanks for the quick response. My order number is 789456123, and I have attached photos showing the size label on the package.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process, and you will receive the money back in 5-7 business days.
I appreciate your help and the quick handling of my refund. Looking forward to receiving the payment soon.
The refund has been processed successfully. Please let us know if you have any further questions.
Just following up to confirm you have received your refund. Please contact us anytime if the issue persists.
Closing the refund case as the customer confirmed satisfaction and receipt of the refund within the expected timeframe.
